EVILY_MAKING_LIST:
I'M MAKING A LIST
OF PEOPLE TO BULLY!
NERDY_THEN_WHY:
Then why do you keep
coming here?!
NERDY_YOU_CANT_SLEEP_HERE:
You can't sleep in here!
This is a library!
The inn is next door!
NERDY_OH_I_SEE:
Oh, I see...
It's THAT book...
LIBRARY_BORING_BOOKS:
All the books around
seem boring to you...
LIBRARY_CUTSCENE_BOOK1:
"The Art of Getting
a Great Sleep"
by Morpheus Mc'Sleepy
LIBRARY_CUTSCENE_BOOK2:
"Quickly falling asleep
Is a true art that has
been passed down in my
family for generations"
LIBRARY_CUTSCENE_BOOK3:
"Let's begin!
As one great philosopher
once said..."
NPC_JOHN_INTRO:
Hello. My name is John...
John Smith. Really.
